entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508: AI-Enabled and Innovative Master Data Governance
entry.content:
Introduction

The image below shows the main product versions of SAP Master Data Governance and the context they are primarily used in. This blog post covers the latest innovations in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, master data governance (shown in the center of the graphic). 

SAP Master Data Governance product versions

Companies that are moving to or already run on SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition and seek to govern their business partner or product data to control key master data processes across the enterprise can now benefit from top notch innovations that come with the latest public cloud version of SAP Master Data Governance: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, master data governance, release 2508 provides new and enhanced features in the areas of AI-enablement, central governance including inbound data integration for decentral maintenance scenarios, master data consolidation, and data quality management for enterprise-wide master data management, plus mass load and maintenance capabilities for local use of product and business partner data in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition. The focus in this release is clearly on the governance in the business partner domain (central governance to put it precisely), but there are still some enhancements in the bag for governing product data. Let me give you more innovation details per area.

Overview of capabilities and indication of new/revamped features for governing business partner data

AI Enablement

AI support in master data processing of business partner and product data has been enabled with a specific focus on increased usability and effectiveness for specific roles. Accordingly:

  • Master data stewards and specialists can now use embedded AI in the key master data processes for business partner and product and benefit from easy filtering to find information using natural language. This way, even experienced master data stewards benefit from increased speed and ease of use in master data processing.
  • Any user who needs to access business partner can benefit from embedded AI filtering for data prompts in natural language.

Search in natrual language with AI-based filtering

Note: The use of the generative AI copilot Joule for business users to display core business partner data in central governance is planned to come prior to the 2602 release, as outlined in SAP Roadmap Explorer.‚Äã

For more information about the role of AI in master data governance and the impact of master data governance for AI, you may read this blog post. 

Central Governance

The enabling of central governance for business partner data  is a cornerstone for an enterprise-wide master data management approach with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, master data governance.

Central creation of a business partner

This is a key capability required for proactive master data management because it ensures data consistency at the point of creation or change (in contrast to reactive consolidation).

SOAP-based inbound data integration for de-central scenarios

Central governance also includes decentral scenarios with integrated inbound processing where the initial data entry (creation or change) is made in a decentral application.

In addition, it features quick process insight through the visualization of the change approval status.

Visualization of change approval status in central governance

In addition to the AI-enabled functions outlined above, central governance for business partner also features increased automation in master data processing through data provider integration and derivation scenarios, both used and designed for auto-populating fields with high-quality data. 

Defining derivation scenario for automated field population

In short, AI-driven and highly automated central governance (including decentral maintenance scenarios) is essential for comprehensive, future-geared master data management across the enterprise.

Please note that central governance for product data is on the roadmap. 

Master Data Consolidation

Best-record calculation

Master data consolidation is all about central activities involved in the de-duplication of de-centrally managed master data. In master data consolidation for business partner, we have significantly increased usability and effectiveness. This includes, for example:

  • Configuration options from workflow to end-to-end automation of processes ‚Äã
  • Inclusion of attachments for all processes‚Äã
  • Maintenance of process-related data such as description, priority, reason, and due date‚Äã
  • Process visualization for clear insight into the current processing status‚Äã

Data Quality Management

Data quality evaluation (business partner data)

Data quality management enables master data stewards to get and keep key master data clean. It gives them a handle to define, enforce, monitor, and improve the quality of business partner and product data based on a rule repository and related data quality evaluations‚Äã. We have increased the usability and effectiveness, for example, by enabling derivation scenarios to automate the creation and updating of business partner and product data, and by an improved process flow in the creation and maintenance of validation rules.

Mass Load and Mass Maintenance

Mass maintenance of business partner

This capability allows you to process master data from uploaded files and make changes to large amounts of business partner and product data for local use. It does not require an extra license and is suited for local maintenance only. The innovations for mass load and mass maintenance specified in the next chapter apply. 

In a Nutshell: New and Revamped Apps for Business Partner Processes

As you can see, the main innovation focus of master data governance with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 is on the business partner domain. In a nutshell, the new and revamped apps for business partner processes (as shown in the image above) have the following benefits:

  • Enable a consumer-grade user experience across all processes via consistent process and UI design, across all MDG processes
  • Allow end-to-end automation and workflow for all relevant processes, including consolidation and mass processing
  • Provide direct editing within mass processing UI (spreadsheet-like UI) for any process step
  • Allow seamless navigation between mass processing and single processing UIs for data maintenance‚Äã

For more information about the individual apps and their implementation, see:

  • SAP Help Portal documentation about Successor apps for mass load and mass maintenance of business partners‚Äã
  • SAP Help Portal documentation about Successor apps for governing business partner data

As pointed out before, major revamping of the product domain including the introduction of central governance is on the roadmap.

Find out more...

I hope this is good news for you when you are planning to start or increase your master data management initiatives on SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition. As pointed out before, more innovations, such as persona-based AI features in master data governance processes and more domain coverage (i. e. product) are planned on the roadmap.

For a complete functional overview of the MDG capabilities in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition 2508, see:

  • Overview presentation
  • Deep-dive presentation
  • Dcumentation on SAP Help Portal.

To stay on track, simply follow the‚ÄØSAP Community Topic Page for SAP Master Data Governance, read the MDG-related blogs,‚ÄØand join the‚ÄØ Q&A forum.

Best,

Markus

‚Äã‚Äã

‚Äã

entry.title: What‚Äôs New in SAP Central Business Configuration 2506
entry.content:
Global Expansion with the Configuration Localization Tool

Navigating the complexities of implementing enterprise software systems across various countries and regions can be a daunting task. A crucial aspect of this process is localization, which involves tailoring the software to meet local legal, regulatory, and cultural requirements. SAP facilitates this process by offering around 60 standard local versions. However, businesses operating in countries beyond SAP's standard offering may have faced significant challenges in the past.

Historically, manual efforts in on-premise projects were the norm, and public cloud solutions lacked viable options for these scenarios. But things have changed now with the introduction of the Configuration Localization Tool, which is embedded in SAP Central Business Configuration. This tool has transformed the localization process, making it more straightforward and efficient.


Adding non-standard countries/regions in the Define Scope app

SAP has introduced a self-service approach for implementing new countries and regions that go beyond the standard offering. This method, known as localization as a self-service for SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, enables you to activate these countries with preconfigured content based on on the settings of a source country or region, currently Germany, giving you a head start in implementing localized operations in a wider range of countries worldwide. The localized scope for each newly created country version is almost equivalent to the German reference scope. This places these custom localizations among the top five in terms of scope flexibility, surpassing many of the smaller standard-localized countries. While the technical localization is taken care of, partners and customers customize the country from a business perspective.

The Configuration Localization Tool not only expands your country coverage but also saves you from the manual efforts associated with on-premise projects in the past, accelerating your organization‚Äôs global expansion.

For a quick summary, check out this video about What's New in 2506. Don‚Äôt forget to also use the What‚Äôs New Viewer on the SAP Help Portal, which provides further details and links about all the recent changes.

That wraps up the new features this time. Did you like this blog? If so, please leave us a thumbs up at the top. Also, make sure to follow the SAP Central Business Configuration tag or follow this dedicated blog collection to stay up to date with the latest blog posts.

Do you have any ideas on how to further enhance SAP Central Business Configuration? Go to the SAP Customer Influence platform to submit an improvement request or vote for the ideas of others. This helps us understand your requirements even better and prioritize our work accordingly. We‚Äôre looking forward to your improvement requests.
